body:
Hey everyone, I've decided to start a new game series on my channel, other than just Minecraft! I don't know if this will be a popular series, but I'm going to see how it goes! :D

Anyways, here's the "kick off" of my Fifa 14 series! :D
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V5xl0s0WAiM

title: Fifa 14 - New Series!

I put it in Off Topic since it isn't Avicus content, and the "Media" section is only for Avicus content. :P

replies.body: Well, Porky... If you play FIFA, what is your favorite club? (to play as)
replies.body_tagged: Well, Porky... If you play FIFA, what is your favorite club? (to play as)

replies.body:
Sorry for the late response. I went to sleep and I just got back from school now.

Well my favourite club is probably Real Madrid, and my favourite to play as is probably Arsenal or FC Barcelona. :D
